function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Miscommunication of professionalism and seriousness due to font choice","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Informal signs in retail stores may not effectively communicate social distancing and hygiene measures, leading to increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent compliance with government regulations due to lack of resources for smaller retailers, potentially leading to increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of paper signage in retail stores may deteriorate quickly due to weather conditions, reducing the effectiveness of communication and hygiene messaging.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Informal signs used to explain the process to customers initially","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Duct tape used for marking direction of travel and indicating where to stand","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stress reducing comprehension of new information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Unclear or unreadable signage regarding social distancing measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mix of informal and professional signs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Longevity of professional signs","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Informal signage and communication strategies in retail environments could lead to ineffective messaging about covid-19 precautions and symptoms.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of standardized signage in small businesses may result in inconsistent communication of covid-19 information to the public.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited ability of small businesses to develop visually appealing and effective signage may hamper the communication of covid-19 precautions and symptoms.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Informal signs printed in small font result in visually messy and unorganized presentation of information, increasing cognitive load on consumers.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of multiple informal signs and different approaches by retailers can lead to inconsistency and potential confusion among customers.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Handmade signs with haphazard appearance may convey unprofessionalism and lack of attention to detail.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Informal signs with general information initially provided to consumers may not effectively communicate specific social distancing rules","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Customer uncertainty due to unreadable signage and lack of clear information about open services and hours of operation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in accessing digitized information for customers without online access","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of replacement signs for covid-19 measures communication","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Panic buying leading to stockouts and scarcity of essential goods","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate communication of stockout reasons to customers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Informal signs with handwritten and typed messages were used to communicate store closures and operating status.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perception of short-term closure led to lack of alternative methods of contact provided by small businesses.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of updating information on signs over time during the pandemic.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Informal signs printed on paper with regular tape may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases if not properly handled or disposed.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Frequent changes to signs and their locations create potential confusion and inconsistency in communicating covid-related information.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of traditional paper signs for covid-related information limits the ability to dynamically update and adapt messaging in real-time.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread of covid-19 in the built environment due to frequent behavioral changes and adjustments by retailers and consumers.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Frequent visits to grocery stores, pharmacies, and restaurants may increase the risk of exposure to covid-19 due to potential contact with infected individuals or contaminated surfaces.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Classification of various establishments as ’retailers’ may overlook specific risks associated with different types of businesses, such as healthcare facilities and personal care services.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Restricted data collection due to social distancing requirements","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of different sign types informal vs. professional","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Extensive use of paper signs for conveying covid-19 information","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited time to conduct research study involving interviews","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of informal signs may lead to incomplete or unclear communication","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced visibility of tobacco and vaping products may increase the likelihood of teenagers seeking out these products through other means, contributing to the spread of addiction and related health issues.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited time and resources for retailers to react to covid-19 guidelines resulted in challenges in implementing proper health and safety measures, potentially leading to the spread of contagious diseases within retail environments.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prominent in-store signs and displays play a role in shaping consumer behavior and prompting particular actions. if used incorrectly, they may inadvertently encourage behaviors that contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-compliance with regulations for social distancing and closure of non-essential services","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Layoffs and remote work due to closure of non-essential services","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Messaging on caloric count and food choices in restaurants","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of public awareness of the term ’social distancing’","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid change in social behaviors and habits","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of technical virtual reality experts to develop virtual reality applications suitable for medical education and healthcare.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Securing electronic medical records using blockchain","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Intrinsic experience in a safe virtual environment using blockchain","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integrating point-of-care diagnostics for self-testing of covid-19 patients in isolation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to a large covid-19 dataset for training and testing ai models","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness about the potential of blockchain in health systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
